titles.title: Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2024
Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2024
North Pacific Research Board Enhancement Act
Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2024
A bill to reauthorize the Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Act to promote the protection of the resources of the Northwest Straits, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cantwell with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 691.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
